name: Office Egg Hunt
description:
Small easter egg hunt game, set in a model of my office to remind people what the office is like while we are still in lockdown.

To control:

Keyboard Movement WASD / arrow keys JumpSpacePick up EggE / Left Mouse ClickSettings Esc

Special Thanks:

https://tatltuae.itch.io/ - testing and making the Mac build 

This game is based on a blender model of the office I made at the start of lockdown.

Blender renders below:

Known issues and fixes:

Currently none. Be sure to let me know if you find any problems.
